component.text:
Activity â€“ Calculate the Number of Valid Hosts (Basic)

This activity provides practice in determining the network address.

In this activity, you are given the network address and subnet mask. You must enter the number of valid hosts per network.

Click the field in the Number of Valid Hosts row to enter your response.
You have not correctly calculated the number of valid hosts, based on the network address and subnet mask. Please click Reset to try again.
You have correctly calculated the number valid of hosts, based on the network address and subnet mask. Please click New Number to continue.
